column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Sokka says : " Well , now you got to see for yourselves how fortune telling is just a big , stupid hoax . "
#Text=Katara says : " You 're just saying that because you 're going to make yourself unhappy your whole life . "
#Text=Sokka says : " That woman is crazy !
#Text=" Katara says : " Well , I liked my predictions .
#Text=Certain things are going to turn out very well .
#Text=" Aang says : " They sure are ... " Katara says : " Why ?
#Text=What did she tell you ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Some stuff .
#Text=You 'll find out .
#Text=" Katara says : " What 's with the sky ?
#Text=" Calm man says : " We are waiting for Aunt Wu to come and read the clouds to predict the fate of the whole village .
#Text=" Aang says : " That cloud kind of looks like a fluffy bunny .
#Text=" Calm man says : " You better hope that 's not a bunny !
#Text=The fluffy bunny cloud forecasts doom and destruction .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Do you even hear yourself ?
#Text=" Village Woman says : " The cloud reading will tell us if Mt. Makapu will remain dormant for another year or if it will erupt .
#Text=" Calm man says : " We used to have a tradition once a year of going up the mountain to check the volcano ourselves .
#Text=But every since Aunt Wu moved to the village twenty years ago , we have a tradition of not doing that .
#Text=" Sokka says : " I ca n't believe you would trust your lives to that crazy , old woman 's superstition !
#Text=" Katara says : " Shhh !
#Text=She 's coming !
#Text="
